title: Im confused i need help
body: Ok i tried to log in today to league and it says  player banned this account has been permanently suspended. please check the email address associated with your league of legends account  for additional details ok after that i go to my email and there isnt anything from league of legends explaining my perma ban im so confused i dont know if its an error or  what but someone please help or tell me who do i need to contact so they can fix this problem.

replies.body: Hey, we applied a security lock on your account as a protective measure.  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help you out.  :D

Hey shad0wdash!

~~You'll definitely want to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this instead. The Help & Support boards can't help with player ban issues :(~~~

~~From the board Guidelines (on the left side of the boards, scroll way down):~~

>~~DO NOT post content regarding account suspensions here. [Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead.~~

EDIT: Poro'd
